about_the_game:
Empyreal is a complex, challenging, feature-rich action RPG. In a far-flung corner of the galaxy an Expedition arrives on a hitherto unexplored planet to find a colossal Monolith built by a lost civilisation.

This demo gives players a chance to delve into Empyreal’s world and explore the unique Cartogram system. These playable Cartograms showcase a small selection of hand-authored levels housed inside two of the Monolith’s four themed Quadrants.

In the demo players can experiment with Empyreal’s character customisation options and sample all three weapon archetypes (Glaive, Mace & Shield, Cannon), with the opportunity to practice with each one starting out in a Training Arena. Once ready to take on the challenge of the Monolith itself and the ancient automatons and bosses lurking within, players can dive into the Cartograms.

The demo also grants players full access to the game’s Hub where they can meet the key NPCs of Empyreal’s story. Last but not least players will be granted a small batch of endgame Gear Sets, Weapons, and Abilities to challenge higher-level content more typical of the late-game experience.

The demo contains:

  • Character customisation

  • Combat training areas and preset loadouts covering all weapon archetypes

  • Instant access to early-build Glaive, Cannon, and Mace & Shield weapons, all featuring unique playstyles

  • Five playable, loot-filled Cartograms set within the Word & Life and Mind & Truth Quadrants

  • Selected boss battles

  • Access to the Hub area and its NPC quest-givers

  • In-depth tutorial options

  • Rapid access to three endgame loadout sets, allowing players to experiment with a small sample of late-game weapons, equipment, and Abilities

  • Hours of content - just a small slice of the full Empyreal experience

Please note that due to unlocking selected endgame content, Empyreal demo save files cannot be carried over into the main game.

content_descriptors.notes: Players should expect to see fantasy violence, using weapons as part of the gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or better 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 Ti 8GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 5600X or better 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 or better 
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
